item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6's Game-Breaking Weapon Charm Explained
item.description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 boasts its fair share of weapon charms, but the Time of Death charm has proven to be a huge source of frustration for Zombies players. Time of Death in Black Ops 6 has been causing game-breaking bugs after a certain point for players trying to rack up kills in Zombies, and there has yet to be a clear cause as to why exactly this is the case.

The Time of Death charm is a special item that players can attach to weapons. Its purpose is to count the number of kills one gets within a match, but once the charm gets past 1,000 kills, it tends to cause major performance issues that leave the game pretty much unplayable. The huge glitches caused by Time of Death have inspired players to share these issues online, warning others of the potential hazard one might have to deal with when using the charm in Zombies.

Black Ops 6's Time of Death Weapon Charm Glitch Seems to Only Effect Zombies Players

Reported Issues Caused By the Time of Death Charm

  • Massive frame rate drop
  • Disappearance of HUD

Sometimes frame rate issues occur out of the blue in games. However, in Zombies, 1,000 kills with Time of Death drastically drops the FPS to an unplayable rate that turns the game's fluidity into a glitchy, sluggish mess. Even worse, the HUD completely disappears, rendering players basically helpless as Zombies quickly approach. While there has yet to be an official reasoning given as to why this bug occurs, many players have concluded that Time of Death may not be programmed to count past 1,000 kills. In a multiplayer match, it's pretty much impossible to rack up such a high kill count, but it's quite doable when playing Zombies. Reddit user xRudeAwakening stated, "I absolutely cannot believe they missed this oversight" on a post discussing the issue.

The Time of Death charm is featured in Black Ops 6 's Death Rattle bundle.

Even more frustrating, the game goes back to normal if players switch to their secondary weapons. However, this doesn't really fix the issue at all, as switching back to the primary weapon that is using the charm immediately throws the game back into a state of disarray. The tracker screen on the Time of Death charm itself even seems to black out, further giving weight to the theory that the charm simply wasn't programmed to go past 1,000 kills. While bundles in Call of Duty games offer new items to players, it's rare for them to feature such a game-breaking issue.

Zombies Players Should Hold Off on Using Time of Death Until Further Notice

So far, there have yet to be any official plans to fix the Time of Death charm. Until a patch is announced, players may be better off only using the charm for multiplayer matches and removing it in Zombies. This hasn't been the first oversight in Black Ops 6 that players have had to deal with, which is unfortunate. While this has been one of the stronger Call of Duty installments in recent years, Black Ops 6 has faced plenty of issues since its October launch.

Black Ops 6 's Death Rattle bundle costs 500 COD Points, which is around $4.99 USD.

From major glitches in Nuketown to the controversy surrounding the price of specific bundles, Black Ops 6 has caused frustration with some portions of the fan base. Despite these issues, Black Ops 6 still manages to be a solid entry in the series. Of course, the Time of Death glitch is frustrating, especially when paying for a bundle's items, but it at least is not necessary in order to enjoy matches. Whether one is playing the various multiplayer modes or gaining impressive kill streaks in Zombies, the Time of Death weapon charm is, unfortunately, an item many players may want to set aside for now.

Honkai: Star Rail may look like a typical turn-based game, but with the gorgeous character design and large areas to explore, it's bound to keep players entertained for hours of gameplay. The combat starts off easy, but will slowly get harder as the game progress, which means it's necessary to properly raise the Trailblazer's party and always keep up with the best equipment.

Here, players can easily access the available Honkai: Star Rail character guides, which include builds, team compositions, Light Cone ranking, and level-up materials. Some tips for harder content like the Simulated Universe are also listed at the bottom section.

This page will constantly be updated with new releases of character guides, so make sure to check back often!

item.title: Marvel Snap: The Best Luna Snow Deck
item.description:
Quick Links

  • The Best Deck for Luna Snow
    • Luna Snow Deck Synergies
  • How to Play Luna Snow Effectively
  • How to Counter Luna Snow
  • Is Luna Snow Worth It?

Joining Marvel Snap ’s roster from Marvel Rivals , Luna Snow is the latest card to kick off December. She’s a 3-Cost, 5-Power On Reveal card with the ability to summon two Ice Cubes on either side of her lane. These Ice Cubes have the Ongoing ability to grant +1 Energy at the start of each round until the lanes are full, after which they self-destruct and stop generating Energy.

Since the Marvel Rivals season introduces exciting cards like Galacta, Doctor Doom 2099, and Rocket Raccoon & Groot, Luna Snow has been overshadowed and hasn't grabbed much attention. But for those eager to try her out in a fun deck, here's the best build for Luna Snow in Marvel Snap ’s current metagame.

Luna Snow (3–5)

On Reveal : Add an Ice Cube to each side of this location.

Series : Five (Ultra Rare)

Season : Marvel Rivals

Release : Dec 3, 2024

The Best Deck for Luna Snow

Luna Snow fits well in a Silver Surfer deck . Her Energy-generating ability lets you play more three-Cost cards, maximizing Silver Surfer’s buff. To create an effective lineup, include the following cards: Luna Snow, Silver Surfer, Hope Summers, Red Guardian, Absorbing Man, Sebastian Shaw, Mobius M. Mobius, Caiera, Forge, Frigga, Brood, and Magik.

Card

Cost

Power

Luna Snow

3

5

Silver Surfer

3

2

Hope Summers

3

4

Forge

2

2

Red Guardian

3

3

Frigga

3

3

Brood

3

2

Sebastian Shaw

3

4

Magik

3

2

Mobius M. Mobius

3

3

Absorbing Man

4

4

Caiera

3

4

Luna Snow Deck Synergies

  • Luna Snow and Hope Summers generate extra Energy, allowing you to play more three-Cost cards before activating Silver Surfer’s buff.
  • Frigga and Absorbing Man are card multipliers, replicating Luna Snow or Silver Surfer's effects.
  • Mobius and Red Guardian are tech options. Mobius guards against Cost fluctuations, while Red Guardian can disable the enemy’s Ice Cube.
  • Forge and Silver Surfer provide buffs, enhancing key three-Cost cards on the board.
  • Magik extends the match, allowing you to drop her if your strategy isn’t intact by turn six.
  • Brood and Sebastian Shaw are your primary buff beneficiaries, Forge and Silver Surfer’s ideal targets.

Frigga and Magik are flex cards; you can replace them with Phastos and Mockingbird.

How to Play Luna Snow Effectively

Here are some key notes to keep in mind when playing Luna Snow:

  1. Luna’s Ice Cube is destroyed at the start of the next round , not when the lane is filled. It survives the turn, grants +1 Energy the next turn, then self-destructs. This is important if you need to unclog a lane on turn five, as you’ll still get +1 Energy on turn six, even if you discard the Ice Cube on turn five.
  2. Luna needs protection . Ice Cube, her main utility, is vulnerable to cards like Killmonger or Red Guardian. To maximize her effect, you'll need to protect her.
  3. You can get creative with Ice Cube’s extra Energy . Cards like Havok can greatly benefit from Luna’s boost. Play Luna, gain extra Energy each turn, and avoid using it immediately. The unspent Energy will eventually be converted into buffs for Havok, passively turning him into a win condition.

How to Counter Luna Snow

  • Killmonger : He can destroy Luna's Ice Cube (a one-Cost card), rendering Luna less effective.
  • Cosmo : If played in the right lane, Cosmo can prevent Luna's effect from activating.
  • Hobgoblin and Green Goblin : These cards can clog Luna's lane, causing her Ice Cube to self-destruct.

The most direct counters to Luna Snow are Killmonger, Cosmo, and the Goblins . However, you can also consider Shadow King, as Luna is a common card in Silver Surfer decks. Cheap drops like Iceman in later turns can also disrupt Luna Snow decks.

Is Luna Snow Worth It?

Luna Snow is a skippable card for two main reasons: 1) There are already stronger cards in the ramp archetype that accomplish what Luna does, and 2) Her Cost makes her a less effective play after round three. She’s only useful if you have a specific niche for her.

If Luna Snow were a two-Cost card, she would be a no-brainer for all ramp decks. However, as is, she only works well when played on curve. On turn four, she’s a bit awkward; on turn five, she occupies valuable space; and by turn six, she’s not worth playing at all.

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Fans Angered by New BlackCell XP Feature
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 fans angered by Activision's new BlackCell XP loyalty bonus.
  • Anybody who continues to purchase the BlackCell Battle Pass for each season will receive a 10% XP increase starting from Season 2.
  • Fans call the feature "disgusting" and "disrespectful," with some even referring to the bonus as pay-to-win.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 fans are calling the recently announced BlackCell Battle Pass loyalty bonus "disgusting" and "disrespectful," with some even referring to the XP boost as a pay-to-win feature. Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 's first mid-season update is now confirmed for December 5, but the community's attention was swiftly taken away from all of the shooter's upcoming content when Activision simultaneously revealed that BlackCell owners would receive an increased XP bonus with each passing season.

The highly-anticipated Season 1 Reloaded update for Black Ops 6 is set to arrive later this week, bringing with it new multiplayer maps and weapons, a new Christmas-themed event, and a brand-new Zombies map. With the holiday season fast approaching, fans will soon be able to jump into a new holiday version of Nuketown with Black Ops 6 's mid-season update. Or, for fans looking for something a little fresher, Treyarch is adding a new two new 6v6 maps into the game's rotation: Racket and Hacienda. The former will also be playable on any 2v2 modes, while the latter is a fan-favorite map from one of the studio's previous Call of Duty titles, Black Ops 4 .

Black Ops 6 Fans Angered Over New BlackCell Loyalty Bonus

While there will be plenty of new content for Call of Duty players to check out later this week, fans have made it clear that they're not happy with Black Ops 6 's new loyalty XP bonus for BlackCell owners. Revealed as part of the Season 1 Reloaded announcement, Activision confirmed that players who continue to purchase the BlackCell Battle Pass will receive further XP bonuses with each passing season. This means that anybody who purchases BlackCell every season will eventually have a 50% XP boost by the beginning of Season 6, with an increase of 10% for every season beginning from Season 2. As expected, the loyalty bonus hasn't gone down well with fans, as some are calling it "disgusting" and "disrespectful."

Call of Duty 's controversial BlackCell Battle Pass was first introduced in 2022's Modern Warfare 2 , offering a premium version of the existing paid Battle Pass with new cosmetic items for players to get their hands on. The catch, however, was that it could not be purchased with COD Points, meaning fans were forced to spend $29.99 USD on top of the existing cost of the standard Battle Pass. While the majority of fans have been against BlackCell for the past couple of years, it hasn't stopped Activision from attempting to entice players with new features.

Reddit user DisaronnoSwigs said they "hope people catch on soon and stop spending money on stuff that gives you nothing of value in return," while Twitter user Dan Lawton believes the new loyalty bonus is "pay to win." Plenty of other users have also pointed out that anybody dedicated enough to purchase the BlackCell for 6 seasons likely won't need an XP boost by Season 2 or 3, making the feature redundant for many.

Prior to the new XP loyalty bonus, Activision made another attempt at getting players to purchase the BlackCell Battle Pass by offering a bonus skin for an already paid store bundle. Black Ops 6 players were angered with the new Replacer bundle after Activision revealed that BlackCell owners would receive a "bonus skin" when purchasing the bundle, but anybody who did not own BlackCell before purchasing the bundle would only receive one skin.

item.title: How To Get Shark Head Bait In Fisch
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Get Shark Head Bait In Fisch
  • Shark Head Bait Stats In Fisch

Fishing in Fisch is becoming more and more difficult with each update, as the developers add new types of fish, rods, and lures. The latter are especially important for you, as they increase your stats and lure certain catches. This guide will explain in detail how to get Shark Head bait in Fisch .

The Shark Head bait has a Mythical rarity, which makes it the most difficult to obtain in this Roblox experience. However, finding suitable crates will make this item easy to get.

How To Get Shark Head Bait In Fisch

Despite its rarity, Shark Head bait is much easier to get than, for example, Truffle Worms. This is because the latter only drops from Geodes and Treasure Chests. At the same time, players just need to open a quality bait crate to add Shark Head bait to their inventory in Fisch .

As the name suggests, quality bait crates offer you rarer items than regular bait crates. But it is worth noting that the drop rate of any bait is the same. So, you just need to open several crates to get Shark Head bait.

Now that you know what you need, you should know where you can reliably find quality bait crates in Fisch . Luckily, there are two ways to get them:

  • Fishing
  • Purchase

The first method is free since you only need a Fishing Rod and Magnet bait. And, while quality bait crates can be caught anywhere, your chances are much higher in locations like Snowcap Island and Sunstone Island .

The second method is the easiest, but it requires you to spend money. Players can purchase as many quality bait crates as they want by visiting Terrapin Island . Each item costs 525 Tokens , so you'll need quite a bit of money.

Once you've gotten quality bait crates in any of the ways, all that's left to do is open them. To do this, hold the item in your hands and click to get various baits, including the Shark Head bait in Fisch .

Video Showcasing Where To Buy Shark Head Bait

Shark Head Bait Stats In Fisch

As expected from Mythical bait , Shark Head gives a significant bonus to your stats. Moreover, it has almost no disadvantages:

  • Preferred Luck : 225
  • Universal Luck : 30
  • Resilience : 10
  • Lure Speed : -5

In addition, Shark Head is the best bait for catching Megalodon in Fisch .
